Description: Day To Day (Illness) - Maxey did not play in Sunday's (Dec. 14) game against the Hawks.
Out (Knee) - Oubre will miss at least two weeks, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.
Day To Day (Shoulder) - Sallis did not play in Sunday's (Dec. 14) game against the Hawks.
Out (Thigh) - Watford will be re-evaluated in two weeks, according to Noah Levick of NBC Sports Philadelphia reports.
